Name: Staff Point
Action Data (JSON): {"type":"staff_points","value":"1 if log.activity and log.activity.name in ['Buy', 'Sell'] else 3 if (log.activity and log.activity.name in ['RP']) or log.event in ['level_up'] else 10 if (log.activity and log.activity.name in ['Quest']) or log.event in ['new_character'] else 0"}
